Package Classes

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.EventManager
public class EventManager extends Object
EventManager The EventManager class manages operations related to events within the application. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and managing event data stored in Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage.
See Also:
  • Event

  • Method Details

    • createEventFromDocument

      public Event createEventFromDocument(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot document)
      Creates an Event object from a Firestore document.
      Parameters:
      document - The Firestore document representing an event
      Returns:
      An Event object populated with the data from the document

    • addEvent

      public String addEvent(Event event, QRcode qrcode, EventLists eventLists, android.net.Uri imageURI, EventManager.OnUploadPictureListener uploadListener)
      Adds a new event to Firestore, uploads its picture if provided, and updates the QR code and event list.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be added
      qrcode - The QR code associated with the event
      eventLists - The event lists object for managing event lists
      imageURI - URI of the event picture to upload
      uploadListener - Listener for handling picture upload success or error
      Returns:
      The document ID of the newly added event

    • generateQRCode

      public String generateQRCode(Event event)

    • getEvent

      public void getEvent(String eventID, EventManager.OnEventFetchListener callback)
      Retrieves an event by ID and executes a callback with the fetched event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event to fetch
      callback - Callback for handling the event fetch result or error

    • uploadEventPicture

      public void uploadEventPicture(android.net.Uri picUri, String docID, EventManager.OnUploadPictureListener listener)
      Uploads an event picture to Firebase Storage and updates Firestore with the image URL.
      Parameters:
      picUri - The URI of the picture to upload
      docID - The document ID of the event to update
      listener - Callback for upload success or error

    • updateEventPictureInFirestore

      public void updateEventPictureInFirestore(String eventID, String picURL, EventManager.OnUpdatePictureListener listener)
      Updates the event picture URL in Firestore for a given event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event to update
      picURL - The URL of the new picture to set in Firestore
      listener - Callback for update success or error

      public void deleteEventPicture(String eventID, EventManager.OnDeleteListener listener)
      Deletes event image from firestore and updates picture url of event to null.

      eventID -
      listener -

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventID)
      Deletes an event from the database by deleting the qrcode first and the eventLists and then the event itself.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The ID of the event object to be deleted
